summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4508 for the improvement of the alley between blocks 9 and 10, Crown Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue West and 9th Avenue West, from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52873, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
